channel.title: How do i code on
channel.description: How do i code on drowning scape when i compile and press run i got loads of stuff like this when i press run i get " at java.net.URLClassloader.Findclass<Unknown Source>" loads of stuff like that wa do i do ? my run file say @echo off title Run server java -cp .;./classes; server pause please help thankz

item.title: How do i code on
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

no no that means either ur not using a gud compile, u dont have jdk compiler stuff programs lol, or the compiler doesnâ€™t use the correct java

replace contents of ur compiler iwth this by clicking edit after right cliking on it

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

Read full topic

loads of stuff like this
when i press run i get
" at java.net.URLClassloader.Findclass"
loads of stuff like that wa do i do ?

title Run server
java -cp .;./classes; server
pause
please help
thankz
